Terms of Service Overview

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the services provided by Las Vegas Home Expert ("we," "our," or "us"). By using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

We provide professional real estate services including consultation, property search, transaction management, and educational resources. These Terms outline the scope of our services, your obligations, and our mutual rights and responsibilities.

Your Obligations

To ensure the best possible service, we ask that you meet these requirements

Accurate Information

Provide truthful and complete information about your needs and circumstances

Why This Matters:

Essential for providing appropriate services and legal compliance

Timely Communication

Respond to requests for information and decisions within reasonable timeframes

Why This Matters:

Ensures smooth transaction process and prevents delays

Financial Preparedness

Have necessary financial documents and pre-approval when applicable

Why This Matters:

Required for serious property consideration and offers

Professional Conduct

Maintain professional behavior during showings and negotiations

Why This Matters:

Creates positive relationships and successful transactions

Service Limitations

Important limitations to understand about our services

Market Conditions

We cannot guarantee specific market outcomes or property values

Impact:

Property values may fluctuate based on market conditions

Third-Party Services

We are not responsible for services provided by lenders, inspectors, or other professionals

Impact:

Quality and terms of third-party services are beyond our control

Legal Advice

We provide real estate services, not legal, tax, or financial advice

Impact:

Consult appropriate professionals for legal, tax, or financial matters

Property Condition

We cannot guarantee the condition of properties or accuracy of all property information

Impact:

Professional inspections are recommended for all properties

Fees and Payment

Clear understanding of our fee structure and payment terms

Commission

Standard real estate commission based on successful transactions

When Due:

Upon successful closing of a real estate transaction

Consultation Fees

Fees for specialized consultation services outside standard transactions

When Due:

As agreed upon before service provision

Additional Services

Fees for additional services such as staging, photography, or marketing

When Due:

As outlined in service agreements

Termination of Services

How and when our service relationship may end

Mutual Agreement

Both parties agree to end the relationship

Process:

Written agreement signed by both parties

Service Completion

Services have been completed as agreed

Process:

Automatic upon successful transaction completion

Breach of Terms

Either party violates the terms of service

Process:

Written notice with opportunity to cure, then termination

Inactivity

No activity or communication for extended period

Process:

Written notice after 90 days of inactivity

Dispute Resolution

We are committed to resolving any disputes amicably and professionally. If you have concerns about our services, we encourage you to contact us directly to discuss the issue.

In the event that we cannot resolve a dispute through direct communication, both parties agree to attempt mediation before pursuing any legal action. Any legal proceedings shall be governed by the laws of the State of Nevada.
